Infectra



*Infectra smiles when Airbomber kisses her*

Infectra: Maybe so=
.

*Infectra says to Airbomber refering to having children one day*

  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent=
: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:50 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Airbomber smiles.
=

  "Good, then maybe we could have some one day." Airbomber said. He kissed=
 Infectra...

  Sinister arives at the Team Ultima Base...
    ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:29 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


    Infectra=
/Blizzard


    Infectra: Yes, I like them....Why?

    *Infectra asks Airb=
omber*



    *Blizzard starts walking faster with Sinister*

      ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
     Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:54 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


      "=
Maybe, who knows. We'll grow old together. Do you like children?" Airbomber=
 asked.

      "Yes! Let's go!" Sinister said. He started walking faster...=

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
     =
   To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:45 PM
  =
      Subject: Re: NBW


        Blizzard/Infectra

        *Blizzard smile=
s*

        Blizzard: Okay, let's hurry so we don't miss anything else like=
 maybe a nice battle.

        *Blizzard says to Sinister*



        *Infe=
ctra smiles when Airbomber hugs her. She didn't think love could happen so =
sudden and fast*

        Infectra: There are probably tones of Maximals in=
 there going on with lifes pretending we're not here.

        *infectra sa=
ys and than grins*

        Infectra: If we wait long enough then we'll get=
 to play in the leaves and snow and than relax in the sun.

        *Infect=
ra says joking wondering when someone will notice them*


          ----- O=
riginal Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:48 PM
          Subject: R=
e: NBW


          "I don't know, let's go back there, now." Sinister said =
to Blizzard.

          Airbomber watched Stranato running around and calli=
ng out. He laughed.

          "Stranato better get some help, otherwise be=
 might become a 'heel' again." Airbomber said. He smiled and hugged Infectr=
a, he never felt this way about a girl before....
            ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
            Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
            =
Subject: Re: NBW


            Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



            *Tw=
ister looks at the sword and sighs*

            Twister: I'll have to get =
used to the fact that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to t=
ravel alone....

            *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places t=
he energon eagles into her arm compartment*


            *Blizzard looks a=
t Sinister and smiles*

            Blizzard: I wonder what's happening bac=
k at the base.



            *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

        =
    Infectra: I trust the both of you......I did trust the others but....

=
            *Infectra sighs*

            Infectra: I need to stop thinking=
 of things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times because=
 there were hardly none.

            *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins=
*


              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE=
 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, August =
04, 2000 4:20 AM
              Subject: Re: NBW


              Sinesis fro=
wns. He holds up his brothers sword.

              "He left this here, wit=
hout it, what shall he do? We have simular problems. I just wish I still ha=
d him by my side." Sinesis said to Twister.

              Sinister held Bl=
izzards hand, illegal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

              St=
ranato calls out.

              "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells through=
 the base. Airbomber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

         =
     "Hopefully, the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occu=
rences happening. I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he h=
asn't always been good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He =
laughed at his words...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
           From: ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
               Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
                Sub=
ject: Re: NBW


                Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



              =
  *Twister looks at Sinesis*

                Twister: I've decided to let =
my sister be...For she's my sister and I love her too much to pull her away=
 from the she loves....

                *Twister opens her arm compartment=
 and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both shaped like an eagle*

  =
              Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unite us as sisters =
and friends forever and always help each other. I found Blizzard's on the g=
round in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident.....

      =
          *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



                (=
OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

                *B=
lizzard skips out of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultim=
a Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



       =
         *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


=
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THE=
CODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thu=
rsday, August 03, 2000 6:59 PM
                  Subject: Re: NBW


       =
           Sinesis sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

   =
               Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maxim=
al base.

                  "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister=
 asked.

                  Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base,=
 since they were never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they w=
ent on in...
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
            =
        From: ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
=
                    Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
               =
     Subject: Re: NBW


                    Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister=



                    *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the=
 Maximal Base*



                    *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he=
 arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*



                    *Bli=
zzard does a little skip out of the cave walks next to Sinister for the Max=
imal Base and holds her hand out towards his wanting to hold hands with him=
*



                    (OOC: Twister is out near the Maximal Base but I'm=
 making her come back anyway.)

                    *Twister leaves the loc=
ation of the Maximal Base seeing as how everyone was else where and went ba=
ck to Team Ultimas Base and sits at the same table as Sinesis*

           =
         Twister: I don't know what I'm going to do....I end up here thinki=
ng I'll find a nice Team where I'm wanted and me and my sister could be sis=
ters and friends...I was such a fool for believing such happiness could hap=
pen.....

                    *Twister puts her double sided sword away sta=
res at the table*


                      ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
                   From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
                      Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
        =
              Subject: NBW


                      Stranato and Airbomber w=
alked toward the Maximal base.

                      Gangon, still dying.
=

                      Deemos and Inzola confront one another several times=
, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

                      Etchingar call=
ed out to Megatron.

                      "Hey, do I got the job?" He aske=
d.

                      Time Bomb waited patiently and Land Mine was heal=
ed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

               =
       Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started=
 back toward Team Ultima's base.

                      Sinesis was healed =
and sat down next to Twister...
